content.description: Rex, audita autem adventusadventus, -us, m.: arrival mei causa, exhilaratus estexhilaro, -are, -avi, -atus: to delight.
content.question: In the sentence, what tense is audita?

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
